name: GoGoGrandparent
headline: A concierge service for seniorsâ rides, meals, meds, home and more.
description: GoGoGrandparent is a virtual retirement community that offers rides, meals, medication, groceries, home maintenance & community for older adults living at home. All services are accessible via regular phone call (no special technology required) and all service providers are vetted & screened. All requests are monitored for greater than 99% reliability, many of our clients rely on us to live years longer in their home.

founders.name: Justin Boogaard, Founder
founders.description:
Born: San Diego
Education: UCLA '11
Work:
Lionsgate 2012 - 2012
Bubbleboard - A company that helped short content producers publish videos in an open network of gyms and coffee shops 2012 - 2014
Soothe - On demand body care: 2014 - 2015
Hustle - A company that recruited 1099 contractors for Uber, Postmates, Instacart, Lyft, Washio, DoorDash and others. 2015 - 2016
GoGo (YC16) - A company that manages the services older adults need to live independently in their home. 2016 - present.

founders.name: David Lung, Founder
founders.description: I hope you're having a great day!

# Groceries, Meals & Rides Services For Seniors & Disabled People
**Screened & monitored services** from Uber, DoorDash, Instacart and more, with or without a smartphone, 24/7.‍**Millions of requests fulfilled** for hundreds of thousands of people living independently at home. Available in all 50 states, Canada, and Australia. 
[1 (855) 464-6872](https://gogograndparent.com/<tel:18554646872>)
[**Get Started**](https://gogograndparent.com/</register/choose>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/678512d62f3f5412bfef4ff6_65bb01a2b5991c8bc251894c_bbb_logo%201.avif)
![An illustration of two older adults getting into a car](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/67850cd60dcd4d1287007e03_Asset%206%40400x%201.avif)
#### as seen in
[![CBS Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/60762bb3bce23c61712aa582_cbs.avif)](https://gogograndparent.com/<https:/www.wbtv.com/story/34579165/new-service-helps-seniors-without-smartphones-take-advantage-of-popular-app-services/>)
[![CBS Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/60762bb076105d034dfb2697_aarp.avif)](https://gogograndparent.com/<https:/www.aarp.org/home-family/your-home/info-2016/car-service-car-share-options.html>)
[![TechCrunch Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/60762bbfa4a36b985d4de9bf_tech%20crunch.avif)](https://gogograndparent.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2016/08/02/gogograndparent-lets-people-without-smartphones-use-on-demand-services-like-uber/>)
[![New York Times Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/62850af46d1102a5f9430032_new-york-times.avif)](https://gogograndparent.com/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2019/08/16/health/uber-lyft-elderly.html>)
[![CNBC Logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/62850b21469480e724fd03ff_CNBC.avif)](https://gogograndparent.com/<https:/www.cnbc.com/2016/06/17/the-sharing-economy-booms-for-boomers.html?slide=9>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/67850e82c5f7dd373a5ab789_6298fc8d817ad64f91bf3de3_forbes%201.avif)](https://gogograndparent.com/<https:/www.forbes.com/sites/juliewalmsley/2018/10/26/a-call-center-talking-your-blind-grandma-into-a-lyft-actually-solves-a-huge-social-problem/>)
## mEMBERSHIP OPTIONS THAT FIT YOUR LIFE
## **choose a plan that works for you**
Our membership model helps us plan how many team members we’ll need to staff to support your requests. Our Concierge Fee covers our costs from when we process a request, start monitoring a service on your behalf to when we stop. Our concierge fee covers the cost of our 24/7 call center, computer server, engineering time and other costs associated with making GoGo available to consumers. In addition to regular credit cards and debit cards, we also accept Direct Express, Social Security's prepaid debit card, for our Uber for seniors, Lyft for seniors, meals, grocery services and transportation services for seniors.
### Basic
For customers and family members looking to use service occasionally.
[Choose Basic Plan](https://gogograndparent.com/</membership-plans>)
### Value
Our most popular plan! For customers and family members looking for a great value on our services.
[Choose Value Plan](https://gogograndparent.com/</membership-plans>)
** _A great deal for most customers!_**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/619490ab1d34aa359c4d1e80_up-arrow%203.avif)
### Premium
For customers and family members planning to use many of our services.
[Choose Premium Plan](https://gogograndparent.com/</membership-plans>)
### Total Care
For customers and family members looking for a comprehensive suite of services as an alternative to long-term care.
[Choose Total Care Plan](https://gogograndparent.com/</membership-plans>)
#### testimonials
## what our customers say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/607731f01064d9fff8e44028_quote-icon.svg)
GoGo is very helpful for my father’s doctor appointments since I am out of state. I love getting the notifications when he is picked up and dropped off. **It really puts my mind at ease.** Thank you GoGo for such a fantastic and reliable service!
-Lauren, a family member
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/62c893a4a279df55ddc26da0_five-star-icon-removebg-preview.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/607731ef16b5a8caac6ce4b3_bubble-icon.svg)
GoGoGrandparent gives me some degree of **independence now** , since I can no longer drive. I love this service.
-Judie, a GoGo customer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/62c893a4a279df55ddc26da0_five-star-icon-removebg-preview.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/607731f0f60fc8d0df0ebffb_heart-icon.svg)
"My rides have been good experiences. I'm treated with **courtesy, respect and excellent service** by both drivers and office folks. I book on the telephone! I never call anyone else--It's GoGo all the way for me!
-Jacqueline, a GoGo customer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/62c893a4a279df55ddc26da0_five-star-icon-removebg-preview.avif)
![Gogo's Logo with a Telephone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603cffd3503d7077716b1d65/62bc7f83b702dc822403d37d_GoGo%20White%20Logo.avif)
Our mission is to make on-demand services accessible and reliable so we can thrive independently and confidently at home and in the community as we age. Available across the United States, Canada, and Australia.

generated_description:
### GoGoGrandparent: Empowering Seniors with Essential Services

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's S16 cohort, GoGoGrandparent is a San Francisco-based company on a mission to provide a comprehensive concierge service for seniors. They focus on essential services that allow older adults to maintain independence while living at home. These services include rides, meals, medications, groceries, home maintenance, and much more—all accessible via a simple phone call.

**Mission Statement:**  
GoGoGrandparent strives to ensure that seniors can thrive independently at home and in their communities, offering convenience and peace of mind.

**Key Features:**

1. **Easy Accessibility:**  
   No need for smartphones or tech-savvy skills. Seniors can access their services through a regular phone call, promoting inclusivity for all users.

2. **Vetted Service Providers:**  
   All service providers are carefully vetted and screened to ensure safety and reliability. This meticulous process contributes to their 99% reliability rate, making it easier for families to trust GoGoGrandparent in their loved ones' care.

3. **Wide Range of Services:**  
   Their offerings include:
   - **Rides** (via partners like Uber and Lyft)
   - **Meals** (through DoorDash and other delivery services)
   - **Groceries** (via Instacart)
   - **Prescription delivery**
   - **Home maintenance**
   - **Virtual community events**

4. **Membership Plans:**  
   GoGoGrandparent offers several membership tiers to cater to different needs—Basic, Value, Premium, and Total Care—with plans that evolve as users' needs change over time.

5. **Geographical Reach:**  
   Services are available across the entire U.S., Canada, and even Australia, making them a truly global player in senior care.

**Impact and Success:**  
With a team of 250 dedicated employees, GoGoGrandparent has managed to fulfill millions of requests for hundreds of thousands of seniors living independently. This substantial impact reflects their commitment to supporting older adults, allowing many to live longer and healthier lives in a familiar environment.

**Customer Feedback:**  
Testimonials from users highlight the reliability and quality of service:
- Family members appreciate the peace of mind when their loved ones use GoGo for essential appointments, as they receive notifications on rides.
- Seniors have reported increased independence, stating they feel empowered to get around without needing to rely on family for transportation.

**Contact Information:**  
If you’d like to find out more or get started with their services, you can visit [GoGoGrandparent's website](https://gogograndparent.com) or reach them at 1 (855) 464-6872.

In conclusion, GoGoGrandparent has ingeniously transformed the way seniors interact with the services they need, proving that the digitization of care doesn't need to alienate those who lack tech familiarity. They empower seniors while fostering community—something we could all use a lot more of.
